page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In the village are three nurseries, a service station ,a building contractors ,a public house ,a poultry farm ,a hatchery and various other farms. The poultry farm and Ross hatchery are the largest local employers.The Ross hatchery employs fifteen workers.At the poultry farm all the chickens are kept for eggs which are sent to the hatchery.Here the eggs are incubated band hatched.Twenty thousand eggs are hatched per week,the chicks are then sent all over the country.New born chicks do not stay at the hatchery for more than one day.Some of the chicks are used for laying whilst others are reared for meat.Ross chicks may end up as Sun Valley chickens or chicken McNuggets at McDonalds.
